backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing enquiries with submit, list, and lookup functions using a map and timestamps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of all major frontend React components, data files, hooks, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining global color variables, dark mode overrides, and applying background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing category and location state and rendering site sections with header and footer.
frontend/src/components/enquiry/EnquiryF: Form component that validates input, builds contextual enquiry messages, and submits them via React Query with success/error UI.
frontend/src/components/enquiry/EnquiryS: Section combining static contact information with the enquiry form.
frontend/src/components/projects/Categor: Toggle UI for switching between Residential and Commercial categories.
frontend/src/components/projects/Locatio: Filter UI for selecting or clearing a project location from predefined options.
frontend/src/components/projects/Project: Displays a projectâ€™s image, details, category badge, and optional status.
Renders a grid of project cards or an empty state when no projects match.
Renders the projects section with category and location filters, displaying a filtered project list.
frontend/src/components/site/Footer.tsx: Displays the site footer with logo, location links, social icons, and dynamic year attribution.
frontend/src/components/site/Header.tsx: Provides a sticky header with navigation buttons that scroll to site sections and an enquiry call-to-action.
frontend/src/components/site/HeroSection: Renders the hero banner with background image, intro text, feature highlights, and navigation buttons.
frontend/src/data/sampleProjects.ts: Defines the Project interface and exports sample project data for display and filtering.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity, invalidating related queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling login, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides a mutation hook for submitting enquiries via the backend actor and invalidates related queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode values, and global styles.
frontend/src/lib/assetPaths.ts: Builds asset URLs safely using the app's base path to avoid incorrect paths in production.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, query client, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, container settings, and includes typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project metadata for a real estate website, including features, known logo issue, requirements, and current project state.
